name: @cf/zai-org/glm-4.7-flash
description: GLM-4.7-Flash is a fast and efficient multilingual text generation model with a 131,072 token context window. Optimized for dialogue, instruction-following, and multi-turn tool calling across 100+ languages.

task.name: Text Generation
task.description: Family of generative text models, such as large language models (LLM), that can be adapted for a variety of natural language tasks.

prompt.description: The input text prompt for the model to generate a response.

model.description: ID of the model to use (e.g. '@cf/zai-org/glm-4.7-flash, etc').

anyOf.description: Parameters for audio output. Required when modalities includes 'audio'.

frequency_penalty.description: Penalizes new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far.

logit_bias.description: Modify the likelihood of specified tokens appearing in the completion. Maps token IDs to bias values from -100 to 100.

logprobs.description: Whether to return log probabilities of the output tokens.

top_logprobs.description: How many top log probabilities to return at each token position (0-20). Requires logprobs=true.

max_tokens.description: Deprecated in favor of max_completion_tokens. The maximum number of tokens to generate.

max_completion_tokens.description: An upper bound for the number of tokens that can be generated for a completion.

metadata.description: Set of 16 key-value pairs that can be attached to the object.

modalities.description: Output types requested from the model (e.g. ['text'] or ['text', 'audio']).

n.description: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.

parallel_tool_calls.description: Whether to enable parallel function calling during tool use.

presence_penalty.description: Penalizes new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far.

reasoning_effort.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models (o1, o3-mini, etc.).

anyOf.description: Specifies the format the model must output.

seed.description: If specified, the system will make a best effort to sample deterministically.

service_tier.description: Specifies the processing type used for serving the request.

stop.description: Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens.

store.description: Whether to store the output for model distillation / evals.

stream.description: If true, partial message deltas will be sent as server-sent events.

anyOf.description: Controls which (if any) tool is called by the model. 'none' = no tools, 'auto' = model decides, 'required' = must call a tool.

oneOf.description: Constrain to an allowed subset of tools.

tools.description: A list of tools the model may call.

name.description: The name of the function to be called.

description.description: A description of what the function does.

parameters.description: The parameters the function accepts, described as a JSON Schema object.

strict.description: Whether to enable strict schema adherence.

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling: considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass.

user.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user, for abuse monitoring.

anyOf.description: Options for the web search tool (when using built-in web search).

name.description: The name of the function to be called.

description.description: A description of what the function does.

parameters.description: The parameters the function accepts, described as a JSON Schema object.

strict.description: Whether to enable strict schema adherence.

messages.description: A list of messages comprising the conversation so far.

model.description: ID of the model to use (e.g. '@cf/zai-org/glm-4.7-flash, etc').

anyOf.description: Parameters for audio output. Required when modalities includes 'audio'.

max_completion_tokens.description: An upper bound for the number of tokens that can be generated for a completion.

metadata.description: Set of 16 key-value pairs that can be attached to the object.

modalities.description: Output types requested from the model (e.g. ['text'] or ['text', 'audio']).

n.description: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.

parallel_tool_calls.description: Whether to enable parallel function calling during tool use.

presence_penalty.description: Penalizes new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far.

reasoning_effort.description: Constrains effort on reasoning for reasoning models (o1, o3-mini, etc.).

anyOf.description: Specifies the format the model must output.

seed.description: If specified, the system will make a best effort to sample deterministically.

service_tier.description: Specifies the processing type used for serving the request.

stop.description: Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens.

store.description: Whether to store the output for model distillation / evals.

stream.description: If true, partial message deltas will be sent as server-sent events.

anyOf.description: Controls which (if any) tool is called by the model. 'none' = no tools, 'auto' = model decides, 'required' = must call a tool.

oneOf.description: Constrain to an allowed subset of tools.

tools.description: A list of tools the model may call.

name.description: The name of the function to be called.

description.description: A description of what the function does.

parameters.description: The parameters the function accepts, described as a JSON Schema object.

strict.description: Whether to enable strict schema adherence.

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling: considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass.

user.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user, for abuse monitoring.

anyOf.description: Options for the web search tool (when using built-in web search).

name.description: The name of the function to be called.

description.description: A description of what the function does.

parameters.description: The parameters the function accepts, described as a JSON Schema object.

strict.description: Whether to enable strict schema adherence.

id.description: A unique identifier for the chat completion.

created.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) of when the completion was created.

model.description: The model used for the chat completion.
